content.rendered:
Address
No. 19 Fifth Link Road
Cantonments
Accra, Ghana

By Email
Please send your message through the Accra Answers – U.S Embassy Accra Consular Information and Service Portal or to the relevant email address(es) below.  We endeavor to respond to email inquiries within five business days.  If the answer to your query is found in automatic responses or in links to official, publicly available information, you will not receive a personalized response.

  • Accra Answers – U.S Embassy Accra Consular Information and Service
  • Adoptions:   Accra Answers https://bit.ly/AccraConsular
  • USTravelDocs.com account, payment, scheduling, and document services: support-ghana@ustraveldocs.com
  • American Citizen Services: ACSAccra@state.gov

By Mail

  • From the United States
    Consular Section
    U.S. Embassy
    2020 Accra Place
    Washington, D.C. 20189-2020
  • From Ghana
    Consular Section
    U.S. Embassy
    P.O. Box 194
    Greater Accra, Ghana

Visa Collection and Document Submission 

All applicants are advised to visit www.ustraveldocs.com/gh  to create an account and register their delivery location as the regular DHL location in Accra or the DHL premium locations at Tema, Tamale, Kumasi  & Takoradi.  Please note that applicants will be responsible for premium delivery location charges.  Visit Accra Answers for more information.  Do not send unsolicited documents to the consular section.

Regular Location

DHL Accra

No. 3 North Ridge Crescent

North Ridge

Accra

No additional charge 

Premium Locations

DHL Kumasi

Kumasi Club Building

Adum

Kumasi

Additional Charge:  GHC 91

 DHL Takoradi

456 Airport Road

Off Axim Road

Takoradi

Additional Charge:  GHC 91
DHL Tamale

Plot CA 15

Commercial Area

Tamale

Additional Charge:  GHC 127

 DHL Tema

Same Compound with Ecobank Ghana

Community 10 Traffic Light, Hospital Road

Tema
Additional Charge:  GHC 67

 

We endeavor to respond to written inquiries within five business days.  Do not send unsolicited personal documents (e.g., bank statements, marriage certificates, etc.) to our office.  We do not return documents received in the mail and we cannot take responsibility for those sensitive documents.
